subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fulham reached a European final for the first time, rallying on second-half goals by Simon Davies and Zoltan Gera to beat Hamburg, 2-1, in the Europa League.
snippet: Fulham reached a European final for the first time, rallying on second-half goals by Simon Davies and Zoltan Gera to beat Hamburg, 2-1, in the Europa League.
